room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Ghost" by The Game Fort Collins in Fort Collins
review: We played this escape room and we had a blast. I rate it about a 6 to 7 or difficulty.

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Ghost" by The Game Fort Collins in Fort Collins
review: Best game in Fort Collins, it is a great family game also one for any group activity. Challenging and inventive. Great puzzles!
